frontmatter.title: Introduction ListPro
frontmatter.meta_title: Introduction to ListApp - Listing Directory app by React native
frontmatter.meta_description: ListPro helps you to create, manage, organize and monetize any listing business you want quickly, seamlessly and beautifully. Having your listing business in App makes a big different for you and your end-users..

markdownRemark.html:
Introduction

ListPro is the newborn from ListApp which exclusive support for ListingPro template (+v2.0), it helps you to create, manage, organize and monetize any listing business you want quickly, seamlessly and beautifully.

Having your listing business in App makes a big different for you and your end-users.

Smooth and easy navigation on their smartphone. Convenience to find and get real-time needed information like reviews, ratings, offers etc..Better controls over personal search and booking history.

Main advantages that ListPro can provide you with

  1. Maximize your website potential:You don't need to waste high amount of money to build new mobile application besides your existing website to enhance your customers booking or ordering experiences when they are on their phones. ListPro takes your website to the next level by releasing your business in Application using contents on your current website.

  2. Better personalization:Each end-user is different from the other. To get profit from them, you need to give them information that they are looking for, within their interest, and real-time.

  3. Able to utilize mobile device features such as:

  4. Maps: ListPro integrates map feature into your listing app to allow your end-users be able to find their nearest interested locations right from their mobile phones.

  5. Offline access: Users can save their location wish-lists, images or booking events offline for later use without the need of internet connection.

  6. Calendar Event: Booking new appointment or making reservations can be in just few minutes through Calendar Event Setting feature of ListPro. After that, your users will be notified through their calendars. Develop listing business on app with ListPro empowers end-user experience which will bring profit to your business.

References

  • iOS demo: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/listpro-listing-directory/id1462398419
  • Google Play demo: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=inspireui.listpro
  • Support Ticket: https://github.com/inspireui/support/issues
  • Website demo: http://listingpro.inspireui.com

  • Video Installing guide: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLcF-HiQy-jOJLwjMwqHiT8eHUuZiaOC
